Posts.Content: IslandGirl58 Me too. Mastectomy and immediate reconstruction 6 months ago. Not a chance of anyone noticing with a bra on.  Just as you say a little more perky than its mate.  Hardly give it a thought these days.  It's the Letrozole tablets I hate! Xx hi Sarah I am new to this and exhausted can I ask what type of reconstruction you had  Thanks
Posts.Title: Qustion re High Grade DCIS
